devNotes.content: ## Day 3 - Web-Design Module Today's class was very interesting, and I enjoyed how to use image tag and set image sizes. Explore some fun website. And the game Flexbox Froggy it's made complex topic more easier and fun to use: - Justify-content Align-items Flex-direction Order Align-self Flex-wrap Flex-flow Align-content ## Story - The Phoenix Bird https://www.figma.com/design/n9ti85myACelYUwXlANq09/PHOTOGRAPHY--Community-?node-id=234-91&m=dev&t=TMQfnGb9rSgRS9Yf-1

I learned a lot and also enjoyed the class.
I am enjoying the process of making a website with own design it's feeling really awesome.
Thankyou Aman Sir for helping me out whenever I faced any problem.
In between some problems came up, but I figured out a few of them and I will keep trying to solve the rest.

### Day 6 : Making Grid Today’s class was a bit tough at first, but slowly I started to understand things. I faced a few problems like figuring out how span works. which was confusing in the beginning, but I managed to figure it out. As I keep doing the confusion started to reduce, although some doubts still remain. I’m working on clearing them step by step. I’m learning new things and enjoying the process. At one point, my mind felt a bit stuck and tired, but I’m determined to keep trying and moving forward. And today’s game really helped a lot it was not just helpful, but also the kind of fun experienced. Playing and learning this way was truly refreshing. It's look easy, but doing it really fried my brain.

### Day 7 
Indie web
Creating a space for ourselves.
Every website is a shrine erected for something divine.
It's awesome to make our own space here and we can bring what we have interest in and our experiences.
and garden web is best example to know how to structure web.

### Manifesto
This space show who really, I am.  Here I can bring everything I love and enjoy. This space brings together both my experiences and interests. I enjoy many things like Drawing, Music, Games and this is where it all connects. This show how I feel honestly, like I’m talking to a friend with full of energy. This space feels fun, colorful, and peaceful. It’s full of energy, but also has meaning, it shows who really, I am in a simple and honest way. As I grow, this space will grow too. I will keep adding more of my work, more of my thoughts, and more of what I learn and try new things so that this space will also become richer and more meaningful. In the end, this space is showing who I am in all my forms. Fun, thoughtful, creative, and always growing.

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/59b38b8d-648d-4186-bad0-220ea08c0bdd)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/942e5393-1185-402d-a5d3-5007e8b93439)

### Day 8 ### Daily Notes Visual Hierarchy How design communicate Design principle ### Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony. ### Task Creating low fidelity website about myself where I could showcase my projects and personal interests. I was a bit confused about how to start because I want it to reflect my thoughts, interest and my work in clean and minimal but meaningful way. I want that when people scroll it, they will feel like they are getting to know me. I explored some blogs and reading also that helped me a lot.
